overview: Released in 1992, this is Gwar's second full-length live concert film.  See Gwar in shocking live footage, heaping abject misery on a deserving world! Hear Gwar pathetically attempt to play "music!" Experience yourself waffling about in a spasmodic frenzy! All this from Gwar, the world's most dangerous band!
title: GWAR - Tour de Scum
